price: 19. Markaasaa waxaa uga yimid amar (dab) xagga Rabbigaa habeennimadii (oo beertii gubatay) intay hurdeen.
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
